comments.body: Dataflow does not print anything on the screen by default. Good practice says to configure the logger to be able to track the progress. This code is run in a separate process, so it's safe.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +177,181 @@    # Dataflow does not print anything on the screen by default. Good practice says to configure the logger
    # to be able to track the progress. This code is run in a separate process, so it's safe.
    logging.getLogger().setLevel(logging.INFO)
    run()
